properties.description: Airlie Gardens, Banff AB45 1AZ Winter Warmer Wednesday starting on 21st Dec 2022 from 3pm - 7pm. Every Wednesday throughout winter, we will be keeping our doors open and offering a friendly, warm space with free Wi-Fi, warm drinks and soups. We hope to have reading materials and a warm inviting environment for people to relax, recharge and warm up.
